tweet_text:
@BryanDando1 @cphhalf @5uperHalfs @ThrombosisUK @ProstateUK @ScotlandNFL It’s an absolute pleasure on both fronts Bryan - the NFL piece is a passion project, so not a hardship! It’s good to be able to support the guys and the great work they do.
